content:
Levi has an extensive musical background. * He has been a singer all his life, and he's played [various instruments](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLIuJN99AFOPTzVmY-g6RAwP9CAIIa-PtS) along the way. * He has a Bachelor of Music in Vocal Performance from the University of Washington. * He's sung in many operas and musicals, including **Dido and Aeneas** (Aeneas), **Savitri** (Satyavan), and **My Fair Lady** (Henry Higgins). * He's sung in dozens of [choirs and a capella groups](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLIuJN99AFOPRl5MH9GwFQWpPEP3zkPLBs). * In recent years, he's also been [composing music](https://soundcloud.com/levilindsey/sets/chiptunes) (mostly chiptunes for his game projects). You can listen to many of Levi's [compositions](https://soundcloud.com/levilindsey/sets/chiptunes) and [performances](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLIuJN99AFOPSF3p4f0siFo22XiMXqijQU) on YouTube and SoundCloud.
Levi Lindsey Â· Chiptunes
